title: Footballism
text:
Footballism () is an <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian, <a href="Persian%20language">Persian language</a>, popular weekly television program broadcast by <a href="Channel%203%20%28Iran%29">Channel 3</a> in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. The host of the program is <a href="Amirali%20Nabavian">Amirali Nabavian</a>. The main subject of the program is the criticism of the sociopolitical aspects of <a href="association%20football">football</a>.
Reception.
<a href="Farheekhtegan">Farheekhtegan</a> published a paper on the strengths and weaknesses of the program.
